title: item sets
body: How do you access item sets in the new client? Can't find them for the life of me.

replies.body: I don't believe item sets are currently available on the updated client.  Stay up to date and share any concerns or feedback for the client devs over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Good luck!

Please the item builds are my favorite feature added in the past 3 years. I play league since preseason 1 on this account and I always had to use third party programs to do item builds but since you guys implemented it I was so happy and I used it every day for all my theorycrafting and builds! Please help me out Porocles- go to scrum and talk about guys like me who can't imagine to play again with mods to client or other third party applications and spreadsheets for all custom fun builds. :/ I really need it!!!!

I clicked on some beta thing and next next next so am I running what everyone has now or am I running some test thing because I to cannot locate the item sets and from the looks of it they are no longer available which basically breaks the game if so because you will have a few people that know all klling it while everyone else uses recommended build.
Pls set fast Item sets i needddddddd this feature for my gameplay :///

Hi Riot,
Please put the Item Sets feature into the new client,  I rely heavily on them for remembering my preferred builds for champions that I enjoy, but don't play often.  It is quite inconvenient going back to old client to change sets, and I assume that the old client will be outdated at some point, so at least before then!
Thanks for hearing from us, the players,
-Runewit
Definitely need item sets back in the client.   Items are changing all the time and now I can't fix my items!
